content.svp: Support setup of study parameters, site groups, milestones, enrollment figures, treatment schedules, and kit design
content.parent_description: Clinical study master involves setting up study master data including completion checks, guided review, and integration to the material master in the SAP solution.
description: Create a new study master object in the SAP solution as a connection point.
Carry clinically relevant parameters such as site groups, milestones, enrollment figures, treatment groups, and packaging levels.
Define complex treatment schedules (including graphical visualization).
Provide built-in support for various study types such as titration, dose escalation, adaptive studies, and platform trials.
Integrate with clinical trial supplies management and interactive response technology dispensation data.
Integrate with the material master for SAP S/4HANA.

Clinical Study Master.description: Clinical study master involves setting up study master data including completion checks, guided review, and integration to the material master in the SAP solution.

content.svp: Accelerate design, implementation, and operation of a native cloud application or service relying on health-related data
content.parent_description: Health data services involves receiving, storing, and working with health data using international standards.
description: Implement the Health Level 7 Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (HL7 FHIR) standard using SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) as a platform as a service.
Manage health data with HL7 FHIR on SAP BTP and SAP HANA Cloud.
Connect with HL7 FHIR using REST and messaging APIs.
Profile resources, data types, extensions, and API features.
Leverage content-driven development with HL7 FHIR packages.
Support event-driven business processes in healthcare.

Health Data Services.description: Health data services involves receiving, storing, and working with health data using international standards.
